averageEventLoopLatency.name: Average Latency
averageEventLoopLatency.description: The average sampled latency, in milliseconds. The latency samples are taken in the last five seconds in one minute.

processWeakCallbacksGcCount.name: Process Weak Callbacks Count
processWeakCallbacksGcCount.description: The count of process weak callbacks GC, in one minute

maximumEventLoopLatency.name: Longest Latency
maximumEventLoopLatency.description: The longest sampled latency, in milliseconds. The latency samples are taken in the last five seconds in one minute

heapSize.name: Heap Size
heapSize.description: The heap size of the Node application in the last interval, in megabytes

maximumEventLoopTickTime.name: Event Loop slowest Tick Time
maximumEventLoopTickTime.description: The longest or slowest tick time (milliseconds) of the event loop in last one minute

markSweepGcCount.name: Mark Sweep Count
markSweepGcCount.description: The count of Mark Sweep Compact GC, in one minute

eventLoopTickCount.name: Event Loop Tick Count
eventLoopTickCount.description: The total number of event loop ticks in last minute

incrementalMarkingGcCount.name: Incremental Marking Count
incrementalMarkingGcCount.description: The count of incremental marking GC, in one minute

gcDuration.name: Garbage Collection Duration
gcDuration.description: The duration of the GC cycle, in milliseconds.

minimumEventLoopLatency.name: Shortest Latency
minimumEventLoopLatency.description: The shortest sampled latency, in milliseconds. The latency samples are taken in the last five seconds in one minute.

scavengeGcCount.name: Scavenge GC Count
scavengeGcCount.description: The count of Scavenge GC in one minute

averageEventLoopTickTime.name: Average Event Loop Tick Time
averageEventLoopTickTime.description: The average tick time of the event loop in milliseconds over the last one minute

usedHeap.name: usedHeap
usedHeap.description: The amount of memory that is used in the Node application, in megabytes

applicationInstanceResourceID.name: Application Instance Resource ID
applicationInstanceResourceID.description: The a pplication instance resource ID.
